items.title: Keep, cut or add? What to do with these eight rising and falling players
items.description: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upward or downward, and explains whether they should be added or cut from your roster.

items.title: Rating Boozer, Dybantsa and 54 more freshmen
items.description: The 56 standouts, surprises and more of a historic freshman class, starting with Cameron Boozer and AJ Dybantsa.

items.title: Power Rankings: How far Michigan, Iowa State, Vanderbilt drop after losses
items.description: Three of the five remaining unbeaten teams suffered their first losses and tumbled down the top 25.

items.title: CFP National Championship preview: Miami's path to knocking off Indiana
items.description: Will the Hoosiers cap an undefeated season, or can the Canes pull off a stunner? Here are the keys to the game.

items.title: Rising prices, plenty of QBs and 1,200 players without a home
items.description: The transfer portal closes today for most players. Here are five things to know after two wild weeks.
